item.description:
Let's M & M - mix & mingle. We've had many new members join recently. This would be a great event to come out and meet our members in a casual setting. Let's enjoy the warm weather this Friday (80s)...summer is almost over.

Join us for a TGIF happy hours at Terrace Lounge. Centrally located in the heart of downtown Boston. It's one block from Chinatown. The Terrace at Avenue One provides the perfect setting for after work cocktails, an evening of relaxation after a week of hard work.

The Terrace is only open Tuesday though Friday, weather permitting. We will meet at 6:00 pm, afterward we will go to dinner (optional) in Chinatown around 8 pm to Bubor Cha Cha.

Cost - cash bar

$5 if you want to share appetizers.

*As always, please update your RSVP if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for friendly group of asians

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF at Terrace Lounge (M & M)
